H

handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class AddCustomerHandler
Handles the http requests for adding a new customer by displaying an HTML form where users can input details related to the new customer
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class AddCustomerProcessHandler
Handles the http requests for adding a new customer through the form submission by extracting data from the incoming request, validates and adds the customer to the database then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class AddItemHandler
Handles the http requests for adding a new food item.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class AddProductHandler
Handles the http requests for adding a new food product by displaying an HTML form where users can input details related to the new product
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class AddProductProcessHandler
Handles the http requests for adding a new food product through the form submission by extracting data from the incoming request, validates and adds the food product to the database then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class CssHandlers.CssAddEditForm
Handles the HTTP requests to provide the CSS styles for add/edit forms.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class CssHandlers.CssLoginRegistrationForm
Handles the HTTP requests to provide the CSS styles for login/registration forms.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class CssHandlers.CssResultPage
Handles the HTTP requests to provide the CSS styles for result pages.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class CssHandlers.CssTable
Handles the HTTP request to serve the CSS styles for table pages.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class DeleteCustomerHandler
Handles the HTTP DELETE requests for deleting a customer by extracting the customer ID from the incoming request, validates and deletes the customer from the database then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class DeleteItemHandler
Handles the HTTP DELETE requests for deleting a food item by extracting the item ID from the incoming request, validates and deletes the item from the database then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class DeleteProductHandler
Handles the HTTP DELETE requests for deleting a food product by extracting the product ID from the incoming request, validates and deletes the product from the database then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class EditCustomerHandler
Handles HTTP requests for editing customer information by extracting the customer ID from the incoming request, validates and retrieves the customer details from the database then displaying a form with the current information and allows editing.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class EditCustomerProcessHandler
Handles HTTP requests for editing customer details through the form submission by extracting data from the incoming request, validates and edited the database accordingly then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class EditProductHandler
Handles HTTP requests for editing food product information by extracting the product ID from the incoming request, validates and retrieves the product details from the database, then displaying a form with the current information and allows editing.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class EditProductProcessHandler
Handles HTTP requests for editing food product details through the form submission by extracting data from the incoming request,validates and edited the database accordingly then sending a response with the result.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class LoginHandler
Handles an HTTP request for logging a user.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class RegistrationHandler
Handles the HTTP request for registering a user.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class RetrieveCustomersHandler
Handles the http request for retrieving customers, Depending on the request method, it either displays all customers or search for specific customers by their business name.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class RetrieveItemsHandler
Handles the http request for retrieving items Depending on the request method, it either displays all food items or filters the expired ones.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class RetrieveProductsHandler
Handles HTTP requests for retrieving food products.It supports displaying all products, filtering products by category and searching products by description.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class WelcomePageAdminHandler
Handles HTTP requests for displaying the administrator welcome page.
handle(HttpExchange) - Method in class WelcomePageCustomerHandler
Handles HTTP requests for displaying the welcome page designed for customers.
